This game goes to extremes. You can have awesome matches with really great moments, or it can be tremendously frustrating. When the game's good it's great. When the game's bad it's awful. I recommend giving it a try with friends. Playing as a killer is generally less disappointing. I like both but I think I prefer killer. The most fun I have is playing in a 5 player custom game with friends over coms. It's really funny but you don't get any rewards.

This game is great, its fun, it has good jumpscares, the only thing I dont like its the killers camping and tunneling, but in general you can still manage to win a match even with those issues. 8//10 simply for the sweaty killer playstyles.

Fun game if you give it a chance. Yes, there are serious sweats running around (usually depending on your rank), but all in all, I have found it to be an entertaining game to play (I don't get sweaty or care about my rank in general) if you make your own fun out of it.
If you're thinking of getting into it to 'Rank Up' and be some kind of DBD God, then enjoy getting annoyed most of the time by killers camping or tunneling (or both), or survivors trolling your ass while you try to become some kind of master killer.

yikes this game is not friendly towards newcomers lol but then I think about how easily I can stomp newcomers in siege after 3,000 hours on the game. I had some really fun tense moments running like crazy from some psycho doctor with a electric baton, I also met some very friendly and welcoming players who gave me some helpful advice and that's great to see in any game :)

Fucking hate this Game and myself

Best at Low Level Play

Though I prefer playing killer in Dead by Daylight, I have spent time as survivor as well and my consensus is that I think the game is best when you're new.

Your first few matches will put you up against new killers or survivors who are oftentimes still wrestling with the map layout, this means they'll run in random directions get confused, wander about aimlessly or corner themselves. This is where the game is the best! It feels like a horror movie with things jumping out of nowhere, survivors running into a basement filled with hooks in a panic, killers being dodged by somebody hiding behind a single tree when they aren't looking!

At higher level play you primarily see the same few killers who are optimized for finishing off survivors without much fuss and the same few perks to do that as efficiently as possible. Higher level survivors are going to know the same few "loops" to run to so they can burn as much time as possible unless they're up against one of a small number of killers who have ways to deal with this. 

Its a fun game and conceptually I love it, but the execution is far from perfect. Try to have fun, don't be afraid to lose matches and stay at low rank. If you're a killer, let the survivors have their fun occasionally, if you're a survivor, don't always run the same loops. Seriously, where is the fun in playing a perfect game every time?

I do recommend this game but only for casual play, its an absolute riot with friends in a closed lobby too!
This game is so much fun I'm glad me and my friends bought it

My thoughts about dbd!


If you wish to add to my FAQ please leave a comment I will reply and edit this. make sure to sub to the comments if you want to see when you get a reply.



This game is ana amazing game to play with friends for hours. All the gameplay is unqiue. For example, you could have a spirit and bring a tool box then next match legion with flashlight. You can also change up you perks, there is 197 perks! Last updated this review 16/04/22  There is 4 perks slots. These perks all do unique thing and help you in different ways.

What you do as surv

As survivor, you goal is to survive and out run the killer in any means such as looping the killer with pallets and windows, this can be lots of fun. In this game you can always change your play style, such as being stealthy to aggresive to troll mode. 

What you do as killer

Well, of course. Kill everyone with titles such as freddy krueger and many more. Stop surv's from doing gens and powering the gates to escape. You have many perks to help you along the way!



FAQ: Should you wait for sale?


No, this game is always worth it!


FAQ: How many hours do you get out of this?


In 2 weeks I got 60 hours. This game is addicting. Please leave any comments if you wish to add to this or want me to edit something! PS: I had this game on console and has 1000+ hours, so I got it on here and still going strong!

Conclusion/ note 


If you wish to add to my FAQ please leave a comment I will reply and edit this. make sure to sub to the comments if you want to see when you get a reply.

I say buy this game if you up for a fun time with friends. This game tends to be boring on your own as surv but fun as killer on your own. Surv is very fun with friends.
